title: Biscuits and Gravy
tagline: Creamy sausage gravy over warm biscuits
steps: Cook sausage over medium, breaking into small pieces, until browned, 8-10 minutes.
Sprinkle flour over sausage. Stir, cook 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in milk, scraping up browned bits.
Season with pepper, cayenne, salt to taste.
Split warm biscuits. Ladle gravy over top.
notes: Don't drain sausage fat - it flavors gravy.
